alert.note: Alert for South End of the Upper Sierra (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 21 at 3:00AM PDT until April 22 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM PDT FRIDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Localized amounts up to 18 inches over higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...South End of the Upper Sierra above 5000 feet. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South End of the Upper Sierra
